projects.title: UNI_VERSE presents UNI_VERSITY
projects.description: UNI_VERSE is an animation studio with its roots in 3D, animation, post,- and content production, but our vision stretches further than this.
projects.text:
UNI_VERSE is an animation studio with its roots in 3D, animation, post,- and content production, but our vision stretches further than this.

We believe in open source, collaborating, experimenting and exploring new ways of pushing the digital landscape towards new realms connecting the digital with the physical world and using compelling and innovative technology while working with the most talented people in the industry.

Because we believe in sharing knowledge within our field of work, we are organising multiple series of workshops. Within these workshops we will let 3D artists and creative coders share their knowledge about animation, design and coding.

Think of software like Cinema4D, TouchDesigner, Unreal, Unity, ARKit, ARCore, Z-Brush, Blender, Substance Painter and programming languages like JavaScript , Python, C++

projects.title: RGBXYZ
projects.description: RGBXYZ is an Amsterdam based digital art festival focussed on providing a platform for groundbreaking contemporary digital art.
projects.text:
RGBXYZ is an Amsterdam based digital art festival focussed on providing a platform for groundbreaking contemporary digital art.

During 4 days a number of independent artists and interdisciplinary makers make up a large-scale program with a wide audience reach.

Think of projection mapping, augmented reality, virtual reality and AI art by internationally renowned and local digital artists like Isabelle Udo and Nikzad Arabshahi.

projects.title: ADIDAS 4D FWD
projects.description:
ADIDAS 4D FWD /// DESIGNED TO MOVE YOU FORWARD… 

 4D Forward makes every step feel like progress. Like every cell in your shoe is pushing you to keep going.
projects.text:
ADIDAS 4D FWD /// DESIGNED TO MOVE YOU FORWARD…

4D Forward makes every step feel like progress. Like every cell in your shoe is pushing you to keep going. The 4DFWD features a 3D-printed midsole with a distinct “4D” bowtie-lattice pattern design to convert a runner’s vertical forces into forward motion. At the same time, it reduces braking forces while increasing cushioning by 23 percent to allow for more comfortable, longer runs.

In collaboration with the team at @tbwaneboko we designed the technical graphics, main campaign image and animation for the new #adidas4DFWD running shoe.

In the resulting key visual and animation we see the extreme flex of the sole compressing and shearing under pressure. A flow of arrows helps represent how downward pressure on the sole results in forward motion as well as leaving a ‘sheared state’ sole behind.

These assets are used in an array of different outputs such as print, online, video and animation. A good example of that is our assets being used in the campaign film by @buildersclub_london

Thanks to the team at @tbwaneboko for trusting us with this as well as @buildersclub_london and all the other collaborators who took part in this campaign.

UNI_VERSE
Creative/Art Director: @jeffbeukema

@terphilippe

Keep moving forward!

projects.title: ADIDAS UB21
projects.description:
Adidas Ultraboost 21

SAY HELLO TO INCREDIBLE ENERGY RETURN. Try out the new augmented reality 'Checkboost' with the link in our bio,
projects.text:
Adidas Ultraboost 21

SAY HELLO TO INCREDIBLE ENERGY RETURN

Try out the new augmented reality 'Checkboost' with the link in our bio, place it anywhere you want and show us on 'the socials' with the Ultraboost21

Ultraboost 21 makes running in the rain feel as good as running by the beach.
Like you're jumping off thousands of mini diving boards, launching you forward.

In collaboration with the team at TBWA we created the main campaign 'Checkboost' image, animation and an augmented reality experience for the new Ultraboost21 running shoe.
We were tasked to get as much energy in the 'Checkboost' campaign image as the UB21 returns to you while running. What do you think? We sure feel like going outside for a run!

These assets are going to be used in an array of different outputs such as print, online, video, animation, DOOH and even in real-time in your home or 'out in the wild.

Many thanks to the entire team at TBWA for the trust, good vibes as well as Machine Molle, Builders Club, Wave Studios and Whale and all the other collaborators who put in the pieces to make this puzzle work.

UNI_VERSE

projects.title: STEDELIJK MUSEUM
projects.description: Name June Paik - Stedelijk Museum The Stedelijk Museum asked us to create a Augmented Reality layer on top of the outdoor campaign of the new Nam June Paik exhibition, previously at the Tate Modern London and Museum San Fransisco.
projects.text:
Name June Paik - Stedelijk Museum

The Stedelijk Museum asked us to create a Augmented Reality layer on top of the outdoor campaign of the new Nam June Paik exhibition, previously at the Tate Modern London and Museum San Fransisco

The exhibition brings together some of Paik's iconic works. An prominent installation from the Stedelijk collection is TV-Buddha (1974), in which an 18th-century wooden Buddha appears to ‘watch’ itself on a modern television, and typifies the influence of (Zen) Buddhist philosophies on Paik’s approach to art and technology. Also on view is TV garden (1974-77), an installation with TV sets alongside living plants. Paik imagined a futuristic landscape where technology is an integral part of the natural world.We brought to live in AR the iconic TV Garden on the Museumplein, in the central hall and the TV Buddha on flyers. People could scan the QR code wich brings you to the Instagram filter, scan the poster and the art appears.

We also created several promotional videos for social.www.stedelijk.nl/en/exhibitions/nam-june-paik

Stedelijk Museum
Interim Marketing

ABOUT.text:
UNI_VERSE

is a hybrid digital creation studio.

3D/AR/VR/GVFX/AI

Our roots are in 3D, animation, post,- and content production, but our vision stretches further than this.

We believe in open source, collaborating, experimenting and exploring new ways of pushing the digital landscape towards new realms connecting the digital with the physical world and using compelling and innovative technology while working with the most talented people in the industry.

Founded by Jeff Beukema & Daan Schraauwers

For Business inquiries: daan@universestudio.xyz

1015NL Amsterdam
